<a name="GUI"></a>

# GUI

<a name="GUI"></a>

## new **GUI**( { autoPlace, mobileBreakpoint, mobileMaxHeight, container, injectStyles, title, width, queryKey, parent } )

todoc

**Parameters**:

 - **options**<br>
Optional:
`object`

 - **options.autoPlace** - Adds the GUI to `document.body` and applies fixed positioning.<br>
Default: `true`

 - **options.mobileBreakpoint** - todoc<br>
Default: `500`

 - **options.mobileMaxHeight** - todoc<br>
Default: `200`

 - **options.container** - Adds the GUI to this DOM element, overriding autoPlace.<br>
Optional:
`HTMLElement`

 - **options.injectStyles** - Injects the default stylesheet as the first child of `document.head`.
Pass false when using your own stylesheet.<br>
Default: `true`

 - **options.title** - Name to display in the title bar.<br>
Default: `Controls`

 - **options.width** - todoc<br>
Optional:
`number`

 - **options.queryKey** - If defined, the GUI will be hidden unless the specified string is found in `location.search`.
You can use this to hide the GUI until you visit `url.com/?debug` for example.<br>
Optional:
`string`

 - **options.parent** - Adds this GUI as a child or "folder" in another GUI. Usually
this is done for you by `gui.addFolder()`.<br>
Optional:
`GUI`

<a href="https://github.com/georgealways/gui/blob/master/src/GUI.js#L47" target="_blank">src/GUI.js:47</a>
***

<a name="GUI#add"></a>

## gui.**add**( object, property, [$1], [max], [step] )

Adds a controller to the GUI, inferring controller type using the `typeof` operator.

**Parameters**:

 - **object** - The object the controller will modify.<br>
Required: 
`object`

 - **property** - Name of the property to control.<br>
Required: 
`string`

 - **$1** - Minimum value for number controllers, or the set of
selectable values for a dropdown.<br>
Optional:
`number` or `object` or `Array`

 - **max** - Maximum value for number controllers.<br>
Optional:
`number`

 - **step** - Step value for number controllers.<br>
Optional:
`number`

**Returns**: `Controller`

<a href="https://github.com/georgealways/gui/blob/master/src/GUI.js#L170" target="_blank">src/GUI.js:170</a>
***

<a name="GUI#open"></a>

## gui.**open**( open=true )

Opens a GUI or folder. GUI and folders are open by default.

```js
gui.open(); // open
gui.open( false ); // close
gui.open( gui._closed ); // toggle
```

**Parameters**:

 - **open** - Pass false to close<br>
Default: `true`

**Returns**: `this`

<a href="https://github.com/georgealways/gui/blob/master/src/GUI.js#L316" target="_blank">src/GUI.js:316</a>
***

# Controller

<a name="Controller#name"></a>

## controller.**name**( name: string )

Sets the name of the controller and its label in the GUI.

**Parameters**:

 - **name**<br>
Required: 
`string`

**Returns**: `this`

<a href="https://github.com/georgealways/gui/blob/master/src/Controller.js#L79" target="_blank">src/Controller.js:79</a>
***

<a name="Controller#onChange"></a>

## controller.**onChange**( callback: function )

Pass a function to be called whenever the value is modified by this controller.
The function receives the new value as its first parameter and `this` will be bound to the
controller.

```js
gui.add( object, 'property' ).onChange( v => {
	console.log( 'The value is now ' + v );
} );

const controller = gui.add( object, 'property' ).onChange(function() {
	console.assert(this === controller);
} );
```

**Parameters**:

 - **callback** - todoc<br>
Required: 
`function`

**Returns**: `this`

<a href="https://github.com/georgealways/gui/blob/master/src/Controller.js#L104" target="_blank">src/Controller.js:104</a>
***

<a name="Controller#setValue"></a>

## controller.**setValue**( value )

Sets `object[ property ]` to `value`, calls `_onChange()` and then `updateDisplay()`.

**Parameters**:

 - **value**<br>
Required: 
`any`

**Returns**: `this`

<a href="https://github.com/georgealways/gui/blob/master/src/Controller.js#L124" target="_blank">src/Controller.js:124</a>
***

## controller.**reset**()

Sets the controller back to its initial value.

***

<a name="Controller#enable"></a>

## controller.**enable**( enabled=true )

Enables this controller.

```js
controller.enable();
controller.enable( false ); // disable
controller.enable( controller._disabled ); // toggle
```

**Parameters**:

 - **enabled**<br>
Default: `true`

**Returns**: `this`

<a href="https://github.com/georgealways/gui/blob/master/src/Controller.js#L163" target="_blank">src/Controller.js:163</a>
***

<a name="Controller#disable"></a>

## controller.**disable**( disabled=true )

Disables this controller.

```js
controller.disable();
controller.disable( false ); // enable
controller.disable( !controller._disabled ); // toggle
```

**Parameters**:

 - **disabled**<br>
Default: `true`

**Returns**: `this`

<a href="https://github.com/georgealways/gui/blob/master/src/Controller.js#L178" target="_blank">src/Controller.js:178</a>
***

## controller.**destroy**()

Destroys this controller and removes it from the parent GUI.

<a name="Controller#updateDisplay"></a>

## controller.**updateDisplay**()

Updates the display to keep it in sync with `getValue()`. Useful for updating your
controllers when their values have been modified outside of the GUI.

**Returns**: `this`

<a href="https://github.com/georgealways/gui/blob/master/src/Controller.js#L239" target="_blank">src/Controller.js:239</a>
***

<a name="Controller#listen"></a>

## controller.**listen**( listen=true )

Calls `updateDisplay()` every animation frame. Pass `false` to stop listening, and use
`controller._listening` to access the listening state.

**Parameters**:

 - **listen**<br>
Default: `true`

**Returns**: `this`

<a href="https://github.com/georgealways/gui/blob/master/src/Controller.js#L258" target="_blank">src/Controller.js:258</a>
***

<a name="Controller#_listening"></a>

## controller.**_listening** : boolean

Used to determine if the controller is listening.  Use `controller.listen(true|false)` to
change the listening state.

<a href="https://github.com/georgealways/gui/blob/master/src/Controller.js#L265" target="_blank">src/Controller.js:265</a>

## controller.**_name** : string

Used to access the controller's name.

***

<a name="Controller#_onChange"></a>

## controller.**_onChange** : function

A function that will be called whenever the value is modified via the GUI.
The function receives the new value as its first parameter and `this` will be bound to
the controller.

<a href="https://github.com/georgealways/gui/blob/master/src/Controller.js#L111" target="_blank">src/Controller.js:111</a>
***
